title: Bonus Episode with Danny Robins
itunes:title: Bonus Episode with Danny Robins
description:
Danny Robins is an award-winning British writer, broadcaster and journalist. 


He created The Battersea Poltergeist, a podcast series for the BBC that combined drama and documentary to tell a real-life ghost story. 


Danny’s BBC podcast series Uncanny, tells individual stories of paranormal encounters, from ghosts to UFOs, and is another multi-million download hit.


As well as all of this, Danny’s play 2:22 – A Ghost Story, a contemporary-set modern supernatural thriller, opened in the West End in August 2021.


He is currently working on an immersive theatre experience which tells the story of Guy Fawkes called The Gunpowder Plot which stars Tom Felton.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
